outputs.output_descr: BCC Science Programme: To provide the Benguela Current Commission and Contracting Parties with the best available scientific advice for regional management of the Benguela Current Large Marine Ecosystem

project_descr: Implementation of the Benguela Current Commission (BCC) Science Programme to Support an Ecosystem Approach to Fisheries Management in the BCLME Region. (BCC: Science Programme to support EAF in BCLME Reg. )
project_title: Science Programme to support Ecosy AF in the BCLME Reg.
